full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO RIGS KYI RNAM GZHAG NYUNG GSAL LEGS BSHAD GSER GYI PHRENG MDZES ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @037A *, ,CES BLO RIGS KYI RNAM BZHAG NYUNG GSAL LEGS BSHAD GSER GYI PHRENG MDZES ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI 'DZAM GLING MKHAS PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS SGO MANGS KYI BLO RIGS PA SNGA PHYI LO BLO RIGS KYI KHYAD PAR RGYAS BSDUS DU MA GSAR DU GTANG BAR SO SO'I ZIN BRIS BYAS TE, BLO RIGS KYI 'DZIN GRVA SNGA PHYIS YANG YANG BSKUL ZHING, KHYAD PAR DAM PA'I SKYES RABS KYI PHRENG BA CAN BDE THANG SPRUL SKU AER TE NI HU THUG THUS RTAGS BRGYAD KHA BTAGS, GOS 'BRUG RGYAN BZHI MA DANG RIN CHEN SER PO DANG BCAS YANG YANG BSKUL BAS MANG DU THOS PA'I SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES ZIN BRIS DAG LA ZHUS DAG BYAS TE RANG LUGS 'THAD LDAN DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG BA'I BSTAN PA'I RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,@037B SVA STI, RIGS PA'I DBANG PHYUG PHYOGS GLANG CHOS GRAGS KYI, ,TSAD MA'I GZHUNG YIG GNAD 'DUS RIGS PA'I 'PHRUL, ,LEGS BSHAD GTER CHEN BLO RIGS MTHA' DPYOD 'DI, ,THAR 'DOD BLO MIG PHYE BA'I THABS GCIG PU, ,DE PHYIR CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL SLAD DU, ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG MI RJE SEN NO YON, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR NAS CHOS SDE SKU 'BUM DU, ,BKOD LEGS PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE TSOGS KYIS, ,RGYAL BSTAN DAR ZHING BSTAN 'DZIN ZHABS PAD BRTAN, ,SKYE DGU CHOS 'BYOR BDE SKYID DPAL GYIS 'TSO, ,KHYAD PAR MI RJE DPON PO YUM SRAS KYI, ,THUGS KYI BZHED DON LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR SHOG , ,,(CES PA 'DI NI SNYOM LAS PA DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
